item.title: Update Intune filters with Windows 11 23H2 build automated
item.description: As you also may know is that using filters in Intune is a best practise. With the come of the Windows 11 23H2 build number it is a good idea ðŸ’¡ to update your filters by adding the new 10.22631.x build number. In this blog post, I show how to update all Windows 11 filters with the new build number using PowerShell and the Graph API.

item.title: Intune filters explained create automated and assignments
item.description: Intune filters are a great way to assign MEM policies to devices. In fact, filters go over groups in several scenarios. Filters help you keep your environment reliable and fast. In this blog, I do some basic explanations about filters, how to use filters, and show how to create Intune filters in an automated way. At last, I show how to assign filters to policies.
